question:
Which year recorded the most consumption of gas paid in CZK?
The first 4 strings of the Date values in the yearmonth table can represent year.
query: SELECT SUBSTR(T2.Date, 1, 4) FROM customers AS T1 INNER JOIN yearmonth AS T2 ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID WHERE T1.Currency = 'CZK' GROUP BY SUBSTR(T2.Date, 1, 4) ORDER BY SUM(T2.Consumption) DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 1
